detectors.description:
ETGFinance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#81-86) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#83)
detectors.markdown:
[ETGFinance.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#L81-L86) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#L83)

detectors.description:
ETGFinance.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#88-94) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#89)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#91)

detectors.description: Variable ETGFinance._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#43) is not in mixedCase

	- _totalSupply = 120000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#57)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ETGFinance.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#63-65)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#12)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ETGFinance.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#67-69)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#13)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#14)
	- ETGFinance.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#71-73)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ETGFinance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#81-86)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#15)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#16)
	- ETGFinance.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#75-79)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#32)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#32-34)
function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol)#75
